body_content.explanation: a person who illegally follows and watches someone over a period of time:
examples: Several well-known women have been troubled by stalkers recently.
Stalkers often use instant messaging on mobile phones to harass victims.

body_content.explanation: a person or animal that follows an animal as closely as possible without being seen or heard, usually in order to catch or kill it:
examples: A team of professional deer stalkers each shoot about 120 animals a year.
A good stalker only singles out weak animals from a herd.
